checklists.title: Personal Emergency Preparedness
checklists.purpose: This checklist helps individuals prepare for a variety of emergency situations, from natural disasters to unexpected crises, ensuring they have the necessary resources and plans in place to stay safe.

steps.description: Collect essential supplies like food, water, medications, flashlights, and a first aid kit. Aim for a 72-hour supply to sustain you during the initial phase of an emergency.
Establish a way to communicate with family members during an emergency, including identifying a central contact person outside the area for everyone to check in with.
Identify specific risks in your area, such as hurricanes, earthquakes, or flooding, to better tailor your emergency preparations.

steps.step: Learn Basic First Aid and CPR
steps.description: Familiarize yourself with first aid and CPR techniques, which can be crucial during emergencies if immediate medical help isnâ€™t available.
Gather and protect important documents, like identification, insurance policies, and medical records, storing them in a waterproof, fireproof container.

checklists.title: Workplace Emergency Preparedness
checklists.purpose: This checklist is designed for businesses and organizations to help staff prepare for emergencies, minimizing risk and ensuring a quick, organized response to keep everyone safe.

steps.description: Create a comprehensive response plan detailing evacuation routes, shelter-in-place procedures, and communication protocols.
Schedule drills for various scenarios like fire, earthquake, or active shooter situations to ensure employees know what to do in an emergency.
Identify key personnel responsible for communicating updates during an emergency and establish clear methods for reaching all employees.
Ensure the workplace has accessible emergency supplies, including first aid kits, fire extinguishers, and personal protective equipment.
Provide regular training on the emergency response plan, including how to safely evacuate, assist colleagues, and locate emergency supplies.
